articles.title: Transfer news and rumours LIVE: Arsenal's Tierney nearing five-year deal - Goal India
articles.description: The 10 South American countries participating in the 2021 Copa America will be split up into two groups of five. The top four in each group will advance to the single-elimination knockout stage, which kicks off with the quarterfinals.

articles.description: Co-leader Rawiri Waititi says Team NZ will “sell their souls to the highest bidder" over plans to take Cup defence overseas.
articles.content:
The Mori Party has hit out at Team New Zealand's plans to take the America's Cup overseas, accusing the Grant Dalton-led syndicate of selling their souls to the highest bidder".

articles.description: Country has made rapid technological advances and this week sent a crew of astronauts to its first space station, but it still lags behind powers like America and analyst says it may take years to catch up.
